content: The Lord, the Psalmist’s Portion in Life and Deliverer in Death.
A Mikhtam of David [probably intended to record memorable thoughts].
I said to the , “You are my Lord;
I have no good besides You.”
As for the saints (godly people) who are in the land,
They are the majestic  the noble  the excellent ones in whom is all my delight.
The sorrows [pain and suffering] of those who have chosen another  will be multiplied [because of their idolatry];
I will not pour out their drink offerings of blood,
Nor will I take their names upon my lips.
